capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed an adult, and I've had my fair share of dealing with him in the Hogwarts years. He's a complex character, to say the least.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid is actually an adult. I completely agree with him on this one, I've seen Hagrid myself and he definitely seems like a grown man.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Harry's eyes are really striking. I mean, have you seen them? They're this incredible shade of emerald green. It's like he's got a little piece of nature right there in front of him.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I'm an administrator on this platform, and I've been noticing that some users have been taking advantage of the system. Specifically, there's someone who's been using their power to manipulate others, which is really not okay. It's frustrating when people abuse their privileges like that.

I'm not a fan of the way the Filch is being portrayed as an administrator. I think he's more of a, well, a bit of a grump, to be honest. He's always causing trouble for Harry and his friends at Hogwarts. I mean, who needs an administrator like that?
